pr_title: CDPCP-1669. Verify user exists in an environment before getting keytab

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe just say: Actor %s has not been synced into environment %s"
Btw, what BadRequestException translates to the user?
timeline.author: giladwolff

replies.bodyText: yeah maybe a notfoundex would be better
replies.author: lacikaaa

replies.bodyText: BadRequestException is 400 bad request. I've updated the message (though I used workload user instead of actor her). And changed to NotFoundException.
replies.author: aarman-cloudera

timeline.message:
CDPCP-1669. Verify user exists in an environment before getting keytab

Currently it's possible for the user to provide a user that isn't
present (hasn't been synced) into an environment. In this case we
throw an approriate exception.
